body:
On Wednesday, Shares of Netflix, Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX) lost -0.42% to $139.52. The share price is trading in a range of $139.05 – 141.39. The stock exchanged hands with 7.61 million shares contrast to its average daily volume of 7.41 million shares.

Netflix is giving itself a reality show makeover with a reboot of “Queer Eye for the Straight Guy,” part of the Los Gatos-based company’s massive effort to get new reality shows on the platform in 2017.

Netflix said Tuesday that it ordered eight episodes of “Queer Eye,” according to Variety. The reboot will bring back behind-the-scenes talent — co-creators David Collins and Michael Williams — but will recast the gay “Fab Five” who grant makeovers to straight men. The show will see the stylists leave New York City to travel to middle America.

“In a time when America stands divided and the future seems uncertain, a team of five brave men will try to bring us closer together with laughter, heart, and just the right amount of moisturizer,” the producers said in a statement. “With a new Fab 5 and the show’s toughest missions to date, Queer Eye moves from the Big Apple to turn the red states pink … one makeover at a time.”

The original series was a huge hit on Bravo in 2003, skyrocketing stars Carson Kressley, Ted Allen, Jai Rodriguez, Thom Filicia and Kyan Douglas to instant fame. The series won an Emmy for Outstanding Reality Program in 2004 and lasted 100 episodes until it went off the air in 2007. (Source: bizjournals.com)

Netflix, Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX) have shown a low EPS growth of -6.50% in the last 5 years and has earnings growth of 54.00% yoy. Analysts have a mean recommendation of 2.30 on this stock (A rating of less than 2 means buy, “hold” within the 3 range, “sell” within the 4 range, and “strong sell” within the 5 range). The stock appeared -2.75% below its 52-week highs and is up 4.35% for the last five trades.

Shares of Suncor Energy Inc. (USA) (NYSE:SU) inclined 0.12% to $32.31. The share price of the stock surged 46.07% for the year.

Analysts give SU a mean recommendation of 1.90. The company has grown 10.65% in past 3 months and in the last five trades has moved up 0.97%. The stock has earnings growth of 190.50% yoy and showed a low EPS growth of -20.80% over the past five years. The stock’s price moved up its 200-day moving average of $29.41. The stock is presently trading up its SMA-50 of $32.61.
title: Analysts’ Recommendations Stocks Watch List: Netflix, Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX) & Suncor Energy Inc. (USA) (NYSE:SU) – News Is Money
